title: Red Screen Lag
body:
During a game i have been having the top of the screen bugging out and there are red stripes jumping around, if anyone else has had this please tell me what you did to fix it, or if you have it still.{{summoner:31}}

Update : i have reinstalled the game and it still happens. its weird.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Do you experience this issue in any other games which are graphically demanding?
update, its the blood moon loading screen that is causing this lag, before that loading screen it does nothing, i have tried on 2 computers both times it was the loading screen which does it to me.
